ygData.subject: Please help!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Fellow Bards, I am lvl 20 now, Yeah!  I bought the binding song 3 days ago.  I do not see any slowness on the Mob at all in attack even though the text
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Fellow Bards,

I am lvl 20 now, Yeah! I bought the binding song 3 days ago. I do not see
any slowness on the Mob at all in attack even though the text said that it
is bind. I was wondering what songs all bards are using for outside
adventure: solo and group, and dungeons in group? I find myself still using
the lvl 1, 7, and 12 song in combat. I am using the lvl 7 song because
somehow I am the attention of the fight, hehe. The other AE song is useless
in dungeons because you will attract too many MOB and most of our higher
song are AE. So please inform me of what song you all use so I can be a
more effective bard in my group.

Thank you,

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
Hammerpaw and Syren Wind
Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
